title: The Crazy Cookie Lady
itunes:title: The Crazy Cookie Lady
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 29 year old single woman and my mom had me when she was 42 so she’s considerably older than my friends’ parents. I’ve always been around older women and I heard a lot of conversations that I shouldn’t have heard before I was of age. My mother and her friends were all single moms and they’ve always been crazy about men.....................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 29 year old single woman and my mom had me when she was 42 so she’s considerably older than my friends’ parents. I’ve always been around older women and I heard a lot of conversations that I shouldn’t have heard before I was of age. My mother and her friends were all single moms and they’ve always been crazy about men.....................................
